title.rendered: We acknowledge with sadness the death of our former student

content.rendered:
We are deeply saddened by the tragic death of one of our former HE students, Florina Pastina, at her home in Croydon last week. Florina, who joined the College in 2013, was a well-liked student, a hard worker with big ambitions. Graduating with a Merit, she went on to become a primary school teacher.
Our thoughts are with her friends and family at this very sad time.
